sourcesContent:
import {React, useEffect} from "react"; import css from "../../carousel.css" import $ from "jquery" export default function Carousel() { const carouselLogic = () => { var multipleCardCarousel = document.querySelector( "#carouselExampleControls" ); if (window.matchMedia("(min-width: 768px)").matches) { var carousel = new bootstrap.Carousel(multipleCardCarousel, { interval: false, }); var carouselWidth = $(".carousel-inner")[0].scrollWidth; var cardWidth = $(".carousel-item").width(); var scrollPosition = 0; $("#carouselExampleControls .carousel-control-next").on("click", function () { if (scrollPosition < carouselWidth - cardWidth * 4) { scrollPosition += cardWidth; $("#carouselExampleControls .carousel-inner").animate( { scrollLeft: scrollPosition }, 600 ); } }); $("#carouselExampleControls .carousel-control-prev").on("click", function () { if (scrollPosition > 0) { scrollPosition -= cardWidth; $("#carouselExampleControls .carousel-inner").animate( { scrollLeft: scrollPosition }, 600 ); } }); } else { $(multipleCardCarousel).addClass("slide"); } } useEffect(() => { carouselLogic(); }, []) return (
